        public Graph buildGraph​(String graphId,
                        ArrayList<Region> regions,
                        ArrayList<String> labelsInfo)
                 throws IOException
        Build a graph for a list regions and information about labels of those regions.
        Parameters:
        graphId - id of the graph.
        regions - regions of an image.
        labelsInfo - information about the labels.
        Returns:
        graph for a list regions and information about labels of those regions.
        Throws:
        IOException
